description: Returns an array of  SizeConstraintSetSummary objects.

nested_items.name: NextMarker
nested_items.description: If you have more SizeConstraintSet objects than the number that you specified for Limit in the request, the response includes a NextMarker value. To list more SizeConstraintSet objects, submit another ListSizeConstraintSets request, and specify the NextMarker value from the response in the NextMarker value in the next request.

nested_items.name: SizeConstraintSetId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for a SizeConstraintSet. You use SizeConstraintSetId to get information about a SizeConstraintSet (see  GetSizeConstraintSet), update a SizeConstraintSet (see  UpdateSizeConstraintSet), insert a SizeConstraintSet into a Rule or delete one from a Rule (see  UpdateRule), and delete a SizeConstraintSet from AWS WAF (see  DeleteSizeConstraintSet).

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the SizeConstraintSet, if any.
